name: SolVR (W.I.P) [SteamVR]
description:
Firstly, thank you for coming to my page and checking out my game.

This is a "demo" of my game that I have been working off and on for 3 years, it was originally my degree final project and was shown at EGX Rezzed. I have been remaking the scripts and art when I have managed to find time and thought I would finally share where it is now to inspire me to make more.

SolVR is designed to be played with 1 controller (Left one in this demo as detailed in the bu list below) this was to help allow for accessibility to more people, including those who may not be able to use both their hands at same time for any reason, if you have any comments, feedback or requests for features or changed that I can make to further improve the controls please leave a comment/topic.

I have only tested with the Oculus Rift, please let me know if it still work with other headsets if you have them. I'm still trying to figure out SteamVR Input with other controllers.

There is still a lot of work to do and this includes just the 

Please feel free to leave comments below and any other issues you run into.

https://www.tumblr.com/blog/maxharrisongames

Controls:

Triggers - Pickup objects and world.

Return to Menu Level - X (Oculus Rift), I'm sure of what it would be on other controllers in SteamVR Input, sorry.

Space Bar - Teleport to other islands from Main Menu world.

Escape - Close game.

Inspired by Marble Madness and Super Monkey Ball

Have a great day, everyday.

Known Bugs/Issues:

Left Controller only for moving worlds.
